name: Contador
body:
### CONTADOR

We tell you how many times a word appears in a string.


### Install: 

    gem install contador



### Usage:

    require 'contador'

    @sentence = Contador.new("Esto sale todo")
    => #<Contador:0x10212a860 @final={:esto=>1, :sale=>1, :todo=>1}>

    @sentence.multiplicity
    => {:esto=>1, :sale=>1, :todo=>1}



### Omitting Frequent Words: 

    $omits = "esto no sale"
    => "esto no sale"

    @sentence = Contador.new("Esto sale todo")
    => #<Contador:0x102110b68 @final={:todo=>1}>

    @sentence.multiplicity
    => {:todo=>1}




### Thanks to:

Bakedweb.net to allow me to write ruby during work. 

Esturisti.co for needing the reports that allowed me to extract the functionality on this gem.

### Support or Contact:

Having trouble? Please contact ivan@bakedweb.net and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

Ivan Acosta-Rubio 
@ivanacostarubio
tagline: We tell you how many times a word appears in a string.
